title: Chicken tagine with almonds and prunes
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '6 chicken thighs', '2 onions, peeled and finely chopped', '2 tomatoes, washed and diced', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '250ml water', 'salt and freshly ground pepper', '400g pitted prunes', '150g flaked almonds']
